item.description:
"With Kwanzhanukamass behind us and the long wait for Spring ahead of us, get thee to a cozy, HT socializing event on January 12th.

Join your fellow Hidden Techies at the Yellow Sofa Cafe and Card shop in Downtown Northampton, where you can sip and schmooze and browse the enormous collection of cards. It's the perfect place for an HT life with WiFi, strong coffee, tasty treats and no obligation networking. Hidden Tech socials are always, well... social. So please, join us after work for a sip and a schmooze at the Yellow Sofa, 24 Main St. Northampton.

When: Monday, January 12, 6:00 to 8:00 p.m.
Where: Yellow Sofa, 24 Main St. Northampton, Mass.
Number: 413-585-5877
Refreshments: Coffee Tea and Yummies as well as thousands of clever cards are available for purchase
Cost: none, by special arranagement with the Yellow Sofa (but bring money for refreshments (and cards if you want) from the Yellow Sofa"

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Hidden-Tech Social
